name: Heart Starts Pounding w/ Kaelyn Moore

episodes.title: Scary Reddit Cult Stories (feat. Amanda Montell)
episodes.description:
Today, we're discussing real terrifying encounters that people had with alleged cults. We’re talking Scientology, people from a “church” showing up at your door to maybe kidnap you, and more. Joined by Amanda Montell, author of the book Cultish, and the host of the Sounds Like A Cult podcast.

Where to Find Amanda & Sounds Like A Cult: 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@AmandaMontellPodcasts
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-cult-of-kundalini-yoga/id1566917047?i=1000702659814
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/452tBQmqzU9wcisVglD8vW?si=rQYnpUTqQZmKD9SpRFr1zA

If you feel you need help getting out of a cult-ish situation, below is a support group: 
https://www.igotout.org

TW: Stalking, Emotional Abuse, Grooming, Suic**e mention, Kidnapping themes.

Watch More!
3 Deadly Abandoned Theme Parks You Can't Visit

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nSKLBmL3aZ0&list=PLY7bFJ2eh_BqApT7iF1ALZ1dnJiDiOF-D&index=3
Creepy Stories From Appalachia That Will Give You Chills

About Heart Starts Pounding
Hosted by Kaelyn Moore, Heart Starts Pounding explores the terrifying, the mysterious, and the downright spooky. Kaelyn brings you chilling true crime, unexplained phenomena, and haunting stories from across the globe and submitted by listeners like you.
Have a heart-pounding story to tell or a case request? Submit your story at https://www.heartstartspounding.com/stories

episodes.title: 107. Starvation Cult Uncovered in Backwoods of Kenya
episodes.description:
In 2024, over 600 bodies were found buried in shallow graves on a compound in the Shakahola forest. Paul Mackenzie had told his followers if they reduced their food intake, they would meet Jesus. This left many with the question - how did things get this bad?

Trigger Warning: Child abuse 

Other HSP Episodes on High Control Groups:

Trapped: Man Kept Family in Secret Room For Years Waiting For The End Of The World
https://youtu.be/923YlA2Rg9Y

Vanished In The Wilderness Parts 1 & 2 (The Colonia Dignidad Cult)
Pt 1. https://youtu.be/QVzmg-z8oqs
Pt 2. https://youtu.be/p7RRvYohp3w

episodes.title: 32: Vanished in The Wilderness Pt 1: The Professor Disappears
episodes.description:
When Boris Weisfeiler embarked on a solo vacation to Chile, he never returned. What came next was a deeper and darker rabbit hole than anyone could have ever expected

episodes.title: 33: Vanished in The Wilderness Pt. 2: The Cult
episodes.description: Why did Boris Weisfeiler disappear in 1985. And did the cult hiding out deep in the Chilean wilderness have anything to do with it? Today, we're exploring the Colonia Dignidad. Subscribe on Patreon for bonus content and to become a member of our Rogue Detecting Society. Follow on Tik Tok and Instagram for a daily dose of horror. We have a monthly newsletter now !
